listing.listing_description:
Inside the gated community of the Nueva Andalucia Valley, Casa Siena resides amongst tall palm trees and lush tropical greenery. The perfect luxury home for a large group of friends and family, this vacation rental is private and serene, whilst enjoying close proximity to all of Marbella’s world-class attractions. Recently renovated to the highest standard, Casa Siena is ready to host your next amazing Luxury Retreats vacation.

Casa Siena makes use of Spanish colonial architecture for its exterior design. Changing the traditional color palette to monochromatic shade’s of white and black creates a modern-chic take on the well-known style. The elegant decor and art-covered walls give Siena’s interior an old Hollywood vibe, making it a great setting for a social affair. Vaulted ceilings with exposed wood beams open the living spaces, while large doorways and windows to the terrace help to ensure the flow of fresh ocean breeze and natural sunlight throughout the spacious interior. The kitchen has a gorgeous and bright atmosphere as well. State of the art stainless steel appliances and clean white cabinetry will inspire your inner chef.

Whether it’s a quiet night in, or you’re hosting an elegant dinner soiree for the whole group, Casa Siena has everything you’ll need. Television, Apple TV, Wi-Fi, and DVD player are great for a relaxing movie night with the family. For a bit more excitement, there’s formal dining inside, alfresco dining on the terrace, a sound system, pool table, and an outdoor kitchen with a bar. After dinner, take a late night dip in the heated swimming pool, or a rejuvenating soak in the hot tub.

Nearby in the small town of Puerto Banus, you’ll find organic food markets, fine dining, Noranjos Golf Club, and pristine beachfront at Playa Puerto Banus. Travel a little further and you’ll be in the heart of Marbella. A city well known for its luxury tourism, Marbella is home to many of the world’s most exclusive vacation villas, yacht clubs, private beaches, and vibrant nightlife.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Escape to a secret garden in Morocco at Villa Jardin Nomade. Designed to be a completely private retreat on the outskirts of Marrakech, this boutique-hotel-inspired vacation rental is set on nearby two and a half acres lush with palm, orange and olive trees. Invite up to seventeen friends or a group of extended family to get in on the secret with you.

Your holiday at this luxury property begins with an airport transfer and includes the services of a household staff of six. Start each day with the provided breakfast, then spend the day lounging by the pool or reading in the pool house, pausing for complimentary coffee, tea or mineral water along the way. Test your skills on the ping-pong table or in the fitness room, or relive your honeymoon with a couple’s massage in the spa room (at extra cost).

Inside its open-concept rooms, Villa Jardin Nomade pairs traditional pieces—Beni Ouarain rugs, incredible artwork—with the modern—arc lamps, wall-to-wall windows—to stunning effect. Open the gracefully arched doors to the terrace to let warm breezes flow through the open living and dining areas or, on cooler evenings, cozy up to the fireplace. There’s also a convenient fully equipped kitchen.

There are four bedrooms in the villa’s main house, all with king beds, and two bedrooms in two separate pavilions: one with a king bed and one with a queen bed. All six bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms, and many have shared balconies or terraces and their own living areas.

From the villa’s location on the Route Amizmiz, it’s a short drive to your choice of several golf courses and, for those traveling with kids, the Oasiria Water Park. Be sure to leave a day in your schedule to explore central Marrakech, from the ever-lively Jemaa el-Fna to the tranquil Jardin Majorelle.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Villa Mirador is located in the beautiful southern part of Spain. Enter a landscape where rolling green hills are spotted with swaying palms stretching their leaves to the sky. Between its stunning pastoral landscape and the high quality luxury amenities at this villa, you will be perfectly poised for the ultimate holiday in this enchanted area of Europe!

Have a refreshing splash in the pristine waters of the private swimming pool. With an outdoor kitchen, barbeque and wet bar, entertaining is a breeze! Kick back on the covered alfresco lounge area, or take in the gentle sea air from the comfort of your balcony. The grounds are rounded out with plenty of sun loungers and a children’s playground. Indoors, you will find a home theater, a bar, a billiards table and Wi-Fi. Other delectable perks include an elevator, a sauna and a wine cellar. Your reservation includes the services of a manager and 24/7 security.

The interiors of Villa Mirador are stately and elegant. Refined artworks, contemporary furnishings and chrome lighting come together in a symphony of style and sophistication. The kitchen includes a giant center island with built-in cooking elements. If you have a special announcement to share with your friends and family, why not take the time to do so over a delicious meal in the impressive formal dining area? And nothing could be dandier than a stiff drink over a game of pool in the dignified lounge with bar!

Six lovely bedrooms and a variety of additional bedding in the Guest House accommodate up to 12 guests in total at Villa Mirador. All of the bedrooms include en-suite bathrooms and televisions. The bedroom with three twin beds is recommended for children.

Located in one of the most exclusive gated communities in southern Spain, Villa Mirador provides you with access to private golf and tennis courses, a horseback riding club, and a heliport. Though the villa makes you feel surrounded by lawn, hills, sky and sea, it’s actually just a 12 km drive from Puerto Banus Beach, an 8 km drive from San Pedro Alcantara and a 18 km drive from Plaza de los Naranjos. Spend an afternoon at Nikki Beach, a 30 km drive away, or take a day trip to Malaga, 78 km away, or Gibraltar, 71 km away. The most convenient airport is in Malaga and is 68 km away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
From its hilltop location, the ultra-luxurious Villa White shines through lush greenery like a beacon, and in Marbella, that's hard to do. Well known as a getaway for the World's elite, Marbella is home to some of the most elaborate vacation homes on the planet, and this is one of them. Its extremely private property features ample indoor and outdoor hosting space, and an incredible view of Marbella's rolling hillsides and the Mediterranean Sea. With accommodations for fourteen, Villa White is the perfect location for a family reunion, vacation with friends, or a romantic wedding ceremony.

Spanish colonial architecture is known for its luxurious, open-air style. Embracing natural surroundings, while celebrating the finest elements of construction and decor. Stone columns, archways, crown molded coffered-ceilings, and marble floors are timeless, elegant, and evidence of the thoughtfully crafted vision that is Villa White. Decorated with the highest-end designer furniture and eclectic works of art, Villa White's open-concept interior is a beautiful space, perfect for hosting large groups. From the living room to the lawn, you'll find numerous areas for the whole group to gather, and plenty of smaller spaces for more intimate interactions.

There is no shortage of entertainment in Villa White, with a home theatre, pool table, indoor hot tub, exercise room, and media room, it won't be hard to keep yourself busy. Or, you could go in the opposite direction and relax in your favorite lounge chair beside the pool, gazing upon the Mediterranean Sea and working on your tan. White's other features include Wi-Fi, air conditioning, security, housekeeping, and an office area.

Located in one of the most exclusive gated communities in southern Spain, Villa White provides you with access to private golf and tennis courses, a horseback riding club, and a heliport. Though the villa makes you feel surrounded by lawn, hills, sky and sea, it’s actually just a 14-minute drive from Puerto Banus Beach, an 11-minute drive from San Pedro Alcantara and a 20-minute drive from Plaza de los Naranjos. Spend an afternoon at Nikki Beach, a 25-minute drive away, or take a day trip to Malaga, 40 miles away, or Gibraltar, 43 miles away. The most convenient airport is in Malaga and is 42 miles away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Every sense is indulged by the artwork, modern design, and the sound, scent, and salt air of the ocean at this contemporary-glam Cape Town retreat. The villa perches over a rocky stretch of shore and mimics the landscape with its concrete and timber frame, all while taking in panoramic views of the Atlantic. It’s a 10-minute drive to the white sand and seafood restaurants lining Camps Bay Beach.

Listen to the waves hitting the shore while doing some splashing of your own in the oceanfront swimming pool, stretch out in the shade of umbrellas covering the outdoor sitting areas, and let the gas barbecue inspire your own version of a South African braai. Entertain with the help of the indoor pizza oven, bar, and integrated sound system, or take a moment to yourself with the help of the exercise room, cable TV, and Wi-Fi.

This vacation rental’s two-story living spaces make a bold statement, whether in the expanse of the open-concept layout, the cheeky artwork lining the walls, or the gold columns defining the space. Wall-to-wall glass offers ocean views in the upstairs living room, dining room, and fully equipped kitchen, and in the downstairs family room and bar.

There are 3 bedrooms at this luxury property: 1 with a king bed and ocean views, 2 with queen beds, all with private ensuite bathrooms and air conditioning. Look for details like leather and velour headboards, along with vibrant art pieces, even in the bathrooms.

It’s a 10-minute walk from the villa to Camps Bay Beach, a favorite with locals and visitors alike where you can occasionally spot couples exchanging vows on the white sand and relive your own honeymoon over seafood and wine at a waterfront restaurant. It’s a 5-minute drive to tony Clifton Beach, and 10 minutes by car to holiday must-sees Table Mountain and Lion’s Head.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Step in from the refreshing sea view balcony of this Clifton villa and feel the warmth of this fine home’s fireplace wash over you. Rich parquet flooring, lengthy sofas, touches of wood and leather, and multiple balconies make for true oceanside comfort. Take up a recliner beside the sun-drenched pool, and sink into a pleasant doze, with a renowned beach, fine restaurants and Table Mountain nearby.

Take in the morning air and taste a flavoursome coffee over a dynamic scene of blue water and white froth, with Villa Do Sol‘s terrace being impressively close to the coast. With Clifton Beach stretching off into the distance, guests can prepare for the day in the stone and marble bathrooms, with both air conditioning and a fireplace ensuring the home is always at the ideal temperature. After a relaxing evening chatting and socializing around the provided barbecue, rich, light-filled bedrooms offer soft beds and comforting furnishings to ensure an unbroken night’s sleep.

This villa is perched very close to one of the finest beaches in the Cape Town area, with Clifton Beach offering an eye-catching expanse of waves, surf and sand. Take a stroll along the waterfront, or get active with a hike up the established trails of the nearby Lion’s Head to take in sweeping views of the coastline. Take a drive down the coastline to visit more charming towns and picturesque beaches, or turn inland and visit some of the country’s oldest vineyards, which have helped build South Africa’s reputation as a wine superpower.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
With an unrivalled view of Table Mountain, this leafy mansion is a fine luxury choice for a memorable stay in Cape Town. Surrounded by mixed woodland, the grandeur of this home makes an instant impression, with an entrance hall, emerald lawns, still ponds and lofty chambers. Savor the refreshing pool and plush rooms after a day exploring the nearby wine country, dramatic countryside and beaches.

Awaken in the soft, sunlit comfort of the airy bedrooms of Arambrook, and throw open the crafted wood shutters to allow the fresh bay air to flow in. Begin the day on the shaded veranda, savoring the sunlight shifting amongst the decorative ponds, green lawns and woodland. Guests can take to the sapphire-blue pool for a rejuvenating dip, relax on the sun recliners, stroll amongst the well-maintained shrubs, trees and gardens, or even play on the living room’s enormous grand piano. The spacious stone floors and porcelain tubs of the bathrooms are always a welcome sight after an active day around the Cape.

Located in one of the city’s most peaceful western suburbs, guests have a good range of options when it comes to day trips around Arambrook. Soak up the arboreal delights of the nearby botanic gardens, or engage in energetic walks or hikes up the many wild trails that wind around the mountain. A tasting trip to nearby wineries is always an appealing option, while a day on much-loved Cliff Beach is ideal when topped off by cool drinks on the mansion’s terrace.  

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
The word ‘Molori’ means ‘to dream’ in seTswana and truly captures the essence of Molori Safari Lodge, which is globally renowned for being South Africa’s most luxurious game lodge. This five-suite retreat sits in the heart of the 75,000-hectare malaria-free Madikwe Game Reserve, 400kms northwest of Johannesburg. Originally built for the family in 2002, it was transformed into a paradise retreat for discerning travelers in 2007. Defined by its exquisite attention to detail, highly personalized service and unpretentious affluence, this fine residence is a perfect fit for those who expect the very best.

Integrated around a family of trees, Molori’s use of natural materials immediately soothes the spirit and accentuates its surroundings. Rich hardwood heated floors and smooth boarded decks lead the eye from indoors to out, to a mirror-calm infinity pool which will entice you for a lantern-lit dip. Absolute privacy is assured in this little corner of paradise, and you can sit and read for hours or gaze at the mind-stopping views of the Dwarsberg Mountains to your heart’s content.

If entertaining suits you better, host a social event here and gather around the bar or take your turn at the grand piano.

Molori’s gourmet chefs will personally consult with you before creating nutritious and delicious meals from fresh, locally-sourced ingredients. Whether you choose to enjoy them in the dining area, al fresco on the terrace or from the comfort of your in-room bar, it's your choice. Your wellbeing is a priority at the resort and when you’re not relaxing in the hot tub, there are plenty of shared amenities on hand at the health spa. Work off any excesses in the gym, sauna and steam room, indulge in a spa treatment (additional cost), and plunge into the chiller pool for an extra refreshing zing.

Whatever you decide to do with your days, a good night’s sleep is inevitable at Molori. All the bedrooms in each suite are graced with king size upholstered beds which can easily be converted to twin beds where required.Each bedroom comes with deluxe en-suite bathrooms with showers. Five of the seven bedrooms also boast freestanding tubs. Most have access to a private deck or balcony and enjoy views of the valley or animal waterholes.

No African adventure would be complete without a safari and you are welcome to join a twice-daily game drive or arrange a guided walk in the bush. Be sure to take your camera! Molori is 102 km to Sir Seretse Khama International Airport and transfers are included.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Beyond is a spectacular luxury villa in the high-end, seaside community of Clifton near Cape Town. With breathtaking, panoramic views of the Atlantic Ocean, the villa features truly extraordinary outdoor/indoor living spaces, six fabulous bedroom suites sleeping ten, and a prime location within an easy drive of the city center, the beaches at Camps Bay and Clifton, and the Twelve Apostles Mountain Range. Ideal for special occasions and destination wedding guests, the vacation rental includes a chef, housekeeping services, and airport transfer.

The villa's visionary design provides an incomparable setting for savoring the sublime ocean views and delicious air of the Western Cape. An ample, open-air terrace with lounge, dining table, and fire pit borders the infinite swimming pool overlooking the verdant coast and azure sea. The terrace also includes a superb outdoor kitchen with classic braai grill and pizza oven. From the open terrace, an expansive threshold with retractable wall leads you into the villa's spectacular great room, with its large and sumptuous lounge and additional dining table. On the other side of the great room is an atrium area with a lush and ample lawn, a lovely setting for private ceremonies. Whether you're entertaining guests, enjoying a momentous occasion with family, or merely relaxing with a group of dear friends, this sensational arrangement of space, light, and furnishings creates a truly unparalleled experience of Cape Town living.

Additional amenities only add to the transcendent quality of Beyond. A stunning party room includes a pool table and ping-pong table under soaring ceilings, while the exercise room, sauna, and steam room provide therapeutic refreshment to body and spirit.

The villa includes four bedrooms with king beds and two with one double bed each. All have ensuite bathrooms, and five of the six enjoy balconies. The deluxe master suite is a luxury apartment unto itself, with a sumptuous king bedroom accompanied by an ample, elegant lounge, all opening to a large balcony with stunning views.

Beyond is perfectly situated within minutes of myriad destinations in and around Cape Town, including the world-class museums and dining in the city center, the renowned communities and beaches at Clifton and Camps Bay, and the sublime peaks of Lion's Head and Table Mountain.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Perched above Clifton Beach, this unique four-bedroom is situated between endless ocean views and the iconic silhouette of Lion’s Head, one of South Africa’s most recognizable natural wonders. With Clifton Beach just a five-minute walk from home, you’ll have no trouble coming and going as you please, without the hassle of driving. From Kaleidoscope’s seaside lookout, you’ll have easy access to the amenities and attractions of both Clifton and Camps Bay beach communities, where you’ll find shopping, nightlife, and a wide range of dining options.

Floor-to-ceiling doorways and an open concept floor plan allow Kaleidoscope’s thoughtfully decorated interiors to enjoy the fresh ocean breeze and scenic vistas from nearly every inch. Inside, stately furniture, eclectic art, and top of the line appliances come together to create an atmosphere that is both soothing and extremely elegant. It’s obvious that a lot of care went into Kaleidoscopes decor; a trait that you’ll surely appreciate during your beach vacation in Cape Town.

Kaleidoscope comes with four en-suite bedrooms, three with ocean views. The fully equipped kitchen is sure to inspire your inner chef, and if you’d prefer to avoid cooking altogether, there is a catered package available. Inside, there’s plenty of space for your entire group at the formal dining table, as well as several smaller seating areas inside and out that are perfect for more casual meals. Outside, you’ll love cooling off in the swimming pool. And, inside, you’ll appreciate Wi-Fi, television, and air conditioning.

Starting your exploration of Cape Town on the Lion’s Head Trail is a great way to get the lay of the land. After a ninety-minute hike, you’ll be rewarded with incredible views of the city and ocean from atop Lion Head’s peak. Once you’ve made the trek back down, treat yourself to a day on the beach, or maybe a beachfront cocktail at The Bungalow or Leopard Bar at Clifton and Camps Bay beaches. For exciting nightlife, visit the V&A Waterfront, where you’ll find some of Cape Town’s best nightclubs and dancehalls. And, if there’s a golfer in your group, King David Mowbray Golf Club is just twenty minutes from Kaleidoscope.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Moondance gazes out on breathtaking ocean views from its lofty perch in Fresnaye, a stylish suburb of Cape Town near the beaches at Clifton and Camps Bay. Designed by renowned contemporary architect Stefan Antoni, the home balances environmental harmony, elegant ambiance, and exceptional amenities for celebration and relaxation, including multiple entertainment areas. Air conditioning, an elevator, and a fitness room create a comfortable haven for extended stays. Four superbly appointed king bedroom suites with ensuite bathrooms accommodate families and groups of friends up to eight in size. Your vacation rental at Moondance includes a private chef, a helicopter viewing tour, and other deluxe services and offerings.

Nestled amid lush gardens and olive trees, Moondance invites you to savor the open-air pleasures of the West Cape. Dip into the infinity swimming pool and bask in the sunlight on lounge chairs facing the horizon. Kindle the outdoor barbeque and pizza oven in the afternoon, and relish an alfresco meal in the sun or shade. Sip fine South African wine at sunset, and linger outdoors under the starry Atlantic sky.

The masterful design creates a graceful flow of space amid the numerous living areas. The kitchen is superbly equipped with chef-grade appliances, serving a beautiful formal dining table and a semi-alfresco entertainment area with bar. Downstairs, another wonderful bar features a glass wall gazing into the pool. The fabulous home cinema includes a sumptuous crescent sofa facing a large screen. The expertly curated collection of contemporary artwork thrives in this luminous and airy setting.

The bedroom suites offer lovely havens for private downtime and peaceful sleep. Each features a king bed, a terrace or balcony, and an ensuite bathroom with dual vanity, shower, and tub. Three of the rooms have their own lounge areas, as well, and the stunning master suite includes a fireplace, kitchenette, and multiple balconies. The accommodations are ideal for corporate retreats and destination wedding guests.

Unique experiences on offer include complimentary, in-house wine tastings and helicopter trips over the sublime coastline. The prime location places you within ten minutes of iconic Lion's Head Mountain and a short drive from several beaches, sublime hiking trails, waterfront nightlife spots, and the heart of Cape Town.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Wine lovers, rejoice! Villa Grenache not only boasts five en-suite, ocean-view bedrooms and a lengthy list of amenities, but this unique villa also enjoys its own private vineyard and sommelier - wine tastings included! Perfect for a big family or a high-end corporate retreat, this luxury rental has an elegant, yet relaxing atmosphere that your group of ten will love. Nearby, you’ll find restaurants, bars, shopping, and beachfront in the trendy Bakoven community, only ten minutes from the V&A Waterfront and Cape Town’s bustling city center.

Showing off its versatility, Villa Grenache merges stylish contemporary interiors with ocean-inspired outdoor spaces to create an open-air beach villa, suitable for the most formal of occasions. Outside, warm wood decking and nautical pin-stripped sun loungers create a stately, seaside ambiance. Inside, elegant white walls and marble flooring act like a canvas for thoughtfully selected designer furnishings. Throughout Villa Grenache, even the most discerning luxury travelers will appreciate the high-end electronics, lavish fixtures, and numerous opportunities to enjoy ocean views.

Villa Grenache makes it easy to find the perfect setting for dinner with an alfresco set on the terrace and a formal dining area positioned along a room-length opening inside, giving both options an incredible ocean view. After dinner, enjoy a relaxing night on the terrace while lounging by the pool. If the evening breeze is cool, the hot tub if the perfect place to warm up and rejuvenate for another exciting day.

Often overlooked for the more popular Camps Bay Beach, Bakoven’s own beachfront is one of Cape Town’s most beautiful, and if you’re looking for a slightly more secluded beach environment, that is the spot. If there’s an aspiring photographer in your party, plan a visit to Lion’s Head, where you’re rewarded with amazing city views after hiking up its ninety-minute trail. And, no trip to Cape Town is complete without visiting its entertainment hub, the V&A Waterfront, where you’ll enjoy a wide range of dining options, bars and nightclubs, fresh food markets, shopping, and even a Ferris wheel.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Step into a Costa del Sol home that feels straight from a decor magazine at Villa Casabel Club. Inspired by traditional Andalusian estates, this three-bedroom vacation rental is a charming getaway for a group of friends or family—or for a honeymoon-style escape. Even better, the villa is a private oasis on the grounds of the Marbella Club Resort, giving you access to luxury amenities and more.

An archway covered in fuchsia bougainvillea welcomes you to the lovely grounds of this casita—and sets the stage for its quaint architecture and beautifully appointed interiors. Start each day of your holiday with coffee at the outdoor table, then shift to a lounger in the sun by the pool or a perch on the shaded section of the terrace. In the evenings, linger by the fireplace or share photos fo your stay via Wi-Fi.

From its tiled roof to its arched doors and windows, Villa Casabel Club exudes traditional charm. The ambience continues in the open-concept great room, whose living and dining areas are framed by a beamed ceiling, cream-colored walls and natural-fiber area rugs. The adjacent kitchen is fully equipped and equally stylish, with retro-chic appliances and cream-colored cabinets.

The villa has two bedrooms with king beds and one bedroom with two twin beds. All three bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms and open to the terrace. Like the great room, the bedrooms are serene and sophisticated, thanks to neutral tones and natural textures.

Guests of Villa Casabel Club are welcome to use the swimming pool and kids club at the Marbella Club Resort, and have access to the resort’s restaurants, bars and spa as well. If you’d like to explore beyond the resort, it’s a 5-minute walk to the jet-set-favorite Playa de Nagueles and a short drive to downtown Marbella, plus two golf courses.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
